channel.title: Tricky 317 Client Run Fix? -detailed explanation!
channel.description:
Ok, so I was running this for the first time and I had thought I fixed it, when this happened [code]RS2 user client - release #317 java.net.UnknownHostException: project06.no-ip.biz at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressesFromNameService(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source) at Jframe.<init>(Jframe.java:18) at client.main(client.java:2457) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
This is my Client run code: [code]@echo off title Project 06- Bringing Back Memories "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause [/code]
Alright, [b]YES[/b], I am on 64 bit, and this is my C:\Program Files (x86) Java folder(sorry for not knowing how to put pics in the post): [url=http://imgur.com/wsIIPXE]http://imgur.com/wsIIPXE[/url]
And yeah I have also tried th Java1.7.0 in replacement of Jre7. Here is the error: [code]RS2 user client - release #317 java.net.UnknownHostException: project06.no-ip.biz at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(InetAddress.java:866) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressesFromNameService(InetAddress.java:125 8) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(InetAddress.java:1211) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1127) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1063) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(InetAddress.java:1013) at Jframe.<init>(Jframe.java:18) at client.main(client.java:2457) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Any help would be GREATLY appreciated.

item.title: Tricky 317 Client Run Fix? -detailed explanation!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It doesn’t understand the host: project06.no-ip.biz
Probably because the host doesn’t exist anymore.
Change it in the client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Tricky 317 Client Run Fix? -detailed explanation!
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Ok, so I was running this for the first time and I had thought I fixed it, when this happened

RS2 user client - release #317 java.net.UnknownHostException: project06.no-ip.biz at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressesFromNameService(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source) at Jframe.<init>(Jframe.java:18) at client.main(client.java:2457) Press any key to continue . . .

This is my Client run code:

@echo off title Project 06- Bringing Back Memories "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

Alright, YES, I am on 64 bit, and this is my C:\Program Files (x86) Java folder(sorry for not knowing how to put pics in the post):
http://imgur.com/wsIIPXE

And yeah I have also tried th Java1.7.0 in replacement of Jre7. Here is the error:

RS2 user client - release #317 java.net.UnknownHostException: project06.no-ip.biz at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(InetAddress.java:866) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressesFromNameService(InetAddress.java:125 8) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(InetAddress.java:1211) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1127) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1063) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(InetAddress.java:1013) at Jframe.<init>(Jframe.java:18) at client.main(client.java:2457) Press any key to continue . . .

Any help would be GREATLY appreciated.
